helpCenterPage.metaDescription: Find answers to your questions about ENGYX, energy tokenization, pre-sale, KYC, and security.
helpCenterPage.title: Help Center
helpCenterPage.subtitle: Have questions? We have answers. Find everything you need to know about ENGYX here.

q1.question: What is ENGYX?
q1.answer: ENGYX is a digital energy asset tokenization platform. We enable investors to participate in renewable energy projects through blockchain technology, offering transparency, liquidity, and new investment opportunities.

q2.question: How does energy tokenization work?
q2.answer: We convert energy assets (like solar plants or wind farms) into digital tokens. Each token represents a fraction of the underlying asset. Investors can buy these tokens, which entitles them to a share of the profits generated by the project.

q3.question: What are the benefits of investing with ENGYX?
q3.answer: Benefits include access to a traditionally exclusive market, greater liquidity for your investments, full transparency thanks to the blockchain, and the opportunity to support the transition to more sustainable energy.

q1.question: What is the ENGYX token?
q1.answer: The ENGYX token is our platform's utility and governance token. It is used to invest in projects, participate in decision-making, and access to exclusive services within our ecosystem.

q2.question: How can I participate in the pre-sale?
q2.answer: To participate in the pre-sale, you need to connect a compatible wallet (like MetaMask or Trust Wallet), complete the KYC verification process, and use one of the accepted cryptocurrencies (like ETH, USDT, or USDC) to purchase ENGYX tokens at a preferential price.

q3.question: When will I receive my tokens after purchase?
q3.answer: Tokens purchased during the pre-sale will be distributed to your wallet according to the vesting schedule specified in our whitepaper. This is done to ensure long-term market stability.

q1.question: Why do I need to complete KYC?
q1.answer: The 'Know Your Customer' (KYC) process is a mandatory legal requirement to prevent money laundering and terrorist financing. It helps us ensure our platform is secure and compliant with international regulations.

q2.question: Is my personal information secure?
q2.answer: Absolutely. We use end-to-end encryption and work with industry-leading identity verification partners to protect your data. Your privacy and security are our top priority. See our Privacy Policy for more details.

q3.question: How do I protect my account and funds?
q3.answer: We recommend enabling two-factor authentication (2FA), using strong and unique passwords, and never sharing your private keys or recovery phrases. ENGYX will never ask you for this information.

termsPage.metaDescription: Terms and Conditions of use for the ENGYX Digital Energy platform.
termsPage.intro: Welcome to https://engyx.io, a platform operated by ENGYX Digital Energy Inc, based in Delaware, USA. By accessing or using this site, you agree to comply with these Terms and Conditions of Use, as well as our Privacy Policy and any applicable regulations.

sections.title: 1. Description of Service
sections.content: ENGYX offers a decentralized platform that allows the acquisition of tokens linked to renewable energy assets. Through blockchain technologies and smart contracts, users can participate in financing clean energy projects by purchasing the ENGYX token.

sections.title: 2. Nature of the Token
sections.content:
The ENGYX Token is not registered as a security with the SEC or any European financial authority. The sale of tokens is limited to jurisdictions where its commercialization is legally permitted.

The ENGYX Token does not represent equity, dividends, or corporate governance rights, and should be considered a utility token or access token, unless otherwise stated under local regulations.

sections.title: 3. Eligibility
sections.content:
To use our services, you must:

  • Be over 18 years of age
  • Not reside in countries sanctioned by OFAC, the EU, or the United Nations
  • Not be included on AML/PEP lists
  • Comply with the local legal requirements of your country

We reserve the right to deny access to the platform to anyone who violates these conditions.

sections.title: 4. KYC and AML Compliance
sections.content:
All users must complete an identity verification process (KYC) provided by our partner Sumsub. This process is designed to comply with:

  • The Bank Secrecy Act (BSA) and FinCEN regulations in the US.
  • The 6th AML Directive (AMLD6) in the European Union
  • Sanctions checks and PEP/AML validations

ENGYX may reject applications or suspend accounts for failing these processes or providing inaccurate data.

sections.title: 5. Associated Risks
sections.content:
Acquiring tokens involves significant risks, including:

  • Total loss of investment
  • Crypto market volatility
  • Regulatory changes affecting the project's operation

We recommend conducting an independent risk assessment and, if necessary, consulting legal and financial advisors before participating.
